chat_history.message:
Hello, my iPhone 13 has the above problem: The best category was selected and unfortunately, the battery only has a maximum capacity of 87%. My wife bought a phone from you that had a maximum capacity of over 90%. Many thanks and best regards, Ufuk.
Many thanks for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt mit iCloud/Google verknüpft.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The device is currently locked by the customer's iCloud account. Inform the customer to unlink their account or we will not be able to proceed with the repair. The customer can follow the instructions from the link below to unlink their iCloud.

https://support.apple.com/de-de/guide/icloud/mmfc0eeddd/icloud

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

I have sent to the customer the procedure to disable the feature "Find My" from icloud.com as described in this article: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360034277353

>>Do not connect the device to the internet / make sure to turn it off or the procedure won't work (the button “Remove from Account” on icloud.com will not appear on the customer’s end) <<

I'll come back to you once the procedure is completed by the customer and FMIP is confirmed to be off.

Thank you for your collaboration,

Paulo from Back Market

Dear ecomobile

The unit is off now (see attachments). Please proceed with the repair/replacement with 3 working days and let us know the TN to forward to the customer. Thank you for understanding. 

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for assisting the customer in unlocking their iCloud. We will proceed with the necessary actions soon. 

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for the reply. Nothing to thank for. That is why we are here. 

Please proceed with the repair/replacement until 12/06/2024 (11:15 hours) and let us know the TN to forward to the customer. Thank you for understanding.

Best Regards,

Paulo from the Back Care Team
